name: og-smart-contracts
description: O&G Smart Contracts for Verified Digital Assets

scripts.deploy:local: hardhat run scripts/deploy-hauska-proxy.js --network localhost && hardhat run scripts/setup-proxy-system.js --network localhost
scripts.deploy:sepolia: hardhat run scripts/deploy-hauska-proxy.js --network sepolia && hardhat run scripts/setup-proxy-system.js --network sepolia
scripts.dev: npm run compile && npm run deploy:local && npm run frontend
scripts.docker:anvil:fresh: docker-compose -f docker-compose.anvil.yml down -v && docker-compose -f docker-compose.anvil.yml up -d
scripts.docker:test: docker-compose exec hauska npm run smoke-test
